title: When Butchering a Cow the Best Cuts of Meat to Get
itunes:title: When Butchering a Cow the Best Cuts of Meat to Get
description: What you need to know to get the best cuts of meat on your cut and wrap order, what to tell the butcher, and the cuts you MUST ask for that the butcher won't offer unless you do. Learn how to make sure you get the most out of your beef and choose the best cuts for you and your family in Part 2 of our Grass Feed Beef Series! For resources, recipes, and links go to https://melissaknorris.com/216
